de.tif.jacob.core.data
Interface IBrowserRecordList

All Known Subinterfaces:
IDataBrowser
public interface IBrowserRecordList

Interface to return a list of IDataBrowserRecord instances.

Note: This interface is already implemented by IDataBrowser. Nevertheless, an application programmer might implement this interface by his own.

Since:
2.7.4
See Also:
IBrowserEventHandler.getChildren(IClientContext, IBrowser, IDataBrowserRecord)

Method Summary
 IDataBrowserRecord getRecord(int index)
          Returns the data browser record given by its index.
 int recordCount()
          Returns the number of records.
 

Method Detail

recordCount

int recordCount()
Returns the number of records.

Returns:
the record number

getRecord

IDataBrowserRecord getRecord(int index)
                             throws java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException
Returns the data browser record given by its index.

Parameters:
index - the index of the record to get.
Returns:
the desired record
Throws:
java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException - if 0 <= index < recordCount() is not fulfilled
